about_the_game:
Game Overview

Dive into "STOP! Don’t Die in Australia", where every state of Australia is a playground for laughter and cheeky surprises. This game isn’t just a love letter to the land of kangaroos and koalas; it’s a full-on comedy show that has you trekking and chuckling through the quirkiest spots down under. With bites of humour as sharp as a croc’s, you’ll be smiling from Perth to Sydney.



You’ll experience Australia in a way that’s never been done before – from dodging dive-bombing magpies to snapping selfies with the funniest local legends – making each session a blast. " STOP! Don’t Die in Australia " isn’t just a game, it’s a collection of laugh-out-loud moments that’ll make you feel like you're part of the most amusing travel group ever. Ready to come along for a ride that's as entertaining as it is endearing?

Key Features

  • Explore the Vastness of Australia: Delve into a land rich with diversity—from the Northern Territory's arid deserts and tropical climate to the East Coast's bustling urban cities, and from coral reefs to the bushland. Each setting is a playground for adventure, chock-full of state-specific minigames and challenges.
  • The Big Barra Bash: Begin your journey with the iconic Million-Dollar Barramundi tournament but stay for the activities that go far beyond.

  • Hilarious Aussie Personalities: Interact with a cast of unforgettable NPCs inspired by the quirkiest Australian stereotypes and personalities. Engage in witty banter, trade fish tales, and navigate the outrageous world of Aussie humor.
  • Dynamic NPC Encounters: Interact with a colourful cast of NPCs who embody the spirit and stereotypes of Australia. Their tales, tasks, and quirks will guide and entertain you as you immerse yourself in Aussie culture.
  • A Cultural Odyssey: Beyond the wildlife, uncover a world alive with modern culture and the Australian way of life—where sporting events, local folklore, and the quintessential Aussie BBQ shape your in-game experience.
  • Solo or Multiplayer: Play your way in solo mode or throw another shrimp on the barbie with friends in multiplayer. The experience is rich, social, and full of surprises regardless of how you play.
  • Unending Adventure: With no concrete end, the game evolves with you. Aim for leaderboard domination, unlock achievements, and be part of influencing the game's development through your feedback and experiences.
  • Strategic Gameplay: Engage in friendly rivalry by pilfering unsaved progress from others. But remember, what goes around comes around—you'll need to strategize to keep your own gains safe!
  • Secure the Haul: Venture back to camp to safeguard your progress. With each successful return, your reputation grows, and so does your virtual bank account.
  • Unlock and Conquer: As your prowess improves, you'll unlock new, tougher regions teeming with opportunities and hazards, from the treasured to the treacherous.
  • Live to Tell the Tale: Survival is key. Dodge swooping magpies, evade giant spiders, outswim sharks, and sidestep snakes. Your every decision could mean the difference between victory and starting from scratch.

content_descriptors.notes: Mildly violent scenes, Dangerous virtual depictions of wildlife threatening life such as giant spiders and crocodiles attacking the player.

name: Thongs

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 3GB, AMD RX 470 4GB, Intel UHD graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default
  • VR Support: NA
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or Intel Core i5-10400 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Super or AMD Radeon RX 5700 (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • VR Support: NA

Conteúdo sexual
